import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import {productDetails} from './ProductsActions' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {Outlet,useParams} from 'react-router-dom' const ProductDetails =(props)=>{ const dispatch = useDispatch() const product = useSelector(state => state.det.product) const {id} = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(productDetails(id)) },[id]) console.log(product.image.map(i=>i.url)) return(

Product Details

i.url)} alt="sdf" height="500" width="500"/>

{product.name}

Product # {product.id}

({product.numOfReviews} Reviews)

R {product.price}

- +

Status: In Stock

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: Amazon

Submit Review
 ) } export default ProductDetails
